hint.text: Point A and Point F signify room temperature and boiling point respectively.

solution.text:
Point F=(8,100)
This shows the water attained its boiling point after 8 minutes

content.text:
A=(0,_{m}_), B=(1,_{j}_), C=(2,_{k}_), D=(3,_{l}_), E=(4,_{l}_), F=(8,100)
After how many minutes did the water attain its boiling point?
